level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-71
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-71, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2401.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-237
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-237, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2410.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 410(d) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(a), (c), (j), (m), (p), (q), (s), (w), (bb), (dd), (ee), (hh) through (kk), (mm) through (oo), (qq) through (uu), (yy), (zz), (bbb), (ddd), and (fff) shall apply for all tax years or taxable periods beginning after December 31, 2000."
